channel.title: Best and awsom minecraft server
channel.description: This is one of the best servers i have been on in a long time. The server has a freebuild world, A creative world, A block Protectoin world and best of all a Faction World! The owner is called Marc and him and hi staff are the kindest most hard working staff on all the servers ive been on. The plugins are Factions, World edit, mcjobs, spamguard, plotme, tree assiist world guard, Chest shops, Lockette, citizens, mcMMO and many more! There is a mob arena where you can play with your friends and a realy cool shoparea! The ip is : mc.tapalla.com Plz check it out ;)

item.title: Best and awsom minecraft server

This is one of the best servers i have been on in a long time. The server has a freebuild world, A creative world, A block Protectoin world and best of all a Faction World!
